boardgame.name: Rivet Wars
Rivet Wars: Eastern Front
Rivet Wars: El Frente del Este
Rivet Wars: Front de l_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Est
boardgame.description: Rivet Wars is a miniatures boardgame that springs forth from the warped imagination of Ted Terranova - set on a world that never quite left World War I but with crazy technology like walking tanks, diesel powered armor, unicycled vehicles and armor plated cavalry!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Don't let the cute visuals fool you, it's a world full of angst, war-torn camaraderie and dark humor._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Rivet Wars is at its heart a strategy game, with both players deploying units each round to counter the threats set forth by their opponent and stay one tactical step ahead._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Heavily influenced by Ted's experience working on RTS games like Rise of Nations, players gather resources (bunkers and capture points) and use these to deploy streams of new units!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;There's an ebb and flow on the tactical landscape and you can stock up surprises for your opponent to be unleashed even as he thinks he's winning!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: D6G Ep 129: Rivet Wars Interview _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Bioshock: Infinite Board Game Review
Episode 2: Last Night On Earth, Lost Boys, and Galaxy Trucker

listing.notes: This is for the Blizkreig Pledge of Kickstarter version. Please see http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/coolminiornot/rivet-wars for more details. Includes all KS exclusives _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; bonuses that come with the package. Shipping: Should be able to change the shipping address in the KS Pledge making it free. Otherwise, buyer is responsible for actual shipping charges. Buyer is also responsible for all commissions. If you want to buy anything more (Optional Item) to the pledge, please let me know and we should be able to add them. Note: Game is not released yet and it is a pre-order. Please see the Kickstarter for more details on estimated shipping date.

This is for the Blitzkrieg KS pledge AND extras. I have the Base Set in shrink, and by Q1 2014, will have some KS extras (Verttanks, Lanskriegers, Alternate Infantry pack) and exclusives (Jetpacker, and most stretch goal characters) that will be selling at a mighty price. Secure yours today at my discounted price. I just need the money now. If youd rather ship as one package once I recieve the extras in 2014, you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll get a 10% savings off your tot all. Thanks for looking!

This game has been opened and punched but not played. This is the retail edition of the game. I will ship via UPS, USPS or Fed Ex at my discretion. Shipping will be $16. This box is heavy and does not fit in a flat rate shipping box.
A new in shrink copy of Rivet Wars. This miniature boardgame is a blast to play. It is fast, easy and fun to play. I will pay for shipping via FedEx Ground to anywhere in the continental U.S.

Cool Mini Or Not (CMNR001) Rivet Wars is a miniatures board game that springs forth from the warped imagination of Ted Terranova - set on a world that never quite left World War I but with crazy technology like walking tanks, diesel powered armor, unicycle vehicles and armor plated cavalry! Don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t let the cute visuals fool you, it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s a world full of angst, war-torn camaraderie and dark humor. Rivet Wars is at its heart a strategy game, with both players deploying units each round to counter the threats set forth by their opponent and stay one tactical step ahead. Heavily influenced by Ted_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s experience working on RTS games like Rise of Nations, players gather resources (bunkers and capture points) and use these to deploy streams of new units! There_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s an ebb and flow on the tactical landscape and you can stock up surprises for your opponent to be unleashed even as he thinks he_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s winning!

Did you miss the Kickstarter? Here_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s your chance to correct that! This bundle is for a KS Blitzkreig level of Rivet Wars, and tons of add-ons! I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m just trying to recoup most of my expense, so this lot is listed for LESS than the price I paid for it. Everything is NIB/NIS, except the external shrink has been removed from the base game only. I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;m listing everything using the names of the boxes the items were received in (because they combined many stretch goals into retail packages). Rivet Wars base game Terrain Pack (2) Tile Set War Room Battle of Brighton Heavy Metal Faction Dice (4 ea, 8 total) The following boxes make up what will be the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;Second Wave_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; retail box (listed on MM and rivet wars.com): Elsa Frost vs. Cher Ami MacLeod_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Guards vs. Baron Munchen Gurads (6 ea instead of retail 4 ea) Strumrad vs. M7 Boss (3 ea instead of retail 2 ea) M3 Vertical Tank vs. Landskrieger (3 ea instead of retail 2 ea) Included but not available online: The Red Baron Reme Funck The Jetpacker Additional non-retail stretch goals (all of these items are included!): 3 Clockwork Soldiers _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; 3 Plague Troopers Battle of Brighton KS roundup (2 flying units and two AA plugs for each army) Blitzkreig box (contains all the KS Exclusive characters and extra units from stretch goals (that aren_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t in retail packaging), as well as the litho, patches, faction dice [listed above], etc.) - General Patson plug - General Romler plug - Vet fig and plug - R100 fig and plug - Baby Girl fig and plug - Man in charge fig and plug - Rosie Riveter and plug - Atomic Robo - Uncle Rivet - Iron Chancellor - 1MT-1 Ostrich - 1 Sturmpanzer - 4 Rocket bikes - 4 Monowheels - 2 Artillery - 2 Machine guns - 12 Allied Infantry - 12 Blight Infantry Secret Mission cards Buyer will pay shipping. GM me with zip code for a quote. International: GM me before purchasing to be sure I can ship to your country and for a shipping quote. I combine shipping when there_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s room! All of my games are cared for in an OCD fashion in a smoke-free, pet free home!

This is the kickstarter Blitzkrieg pledge level plus numerous add-ons. Buyer will pay shipping fees (estimated $35 within United States). Note the shrink wrap has been removed on the base game, but all other packages are unopened. Please feel free to ask me any questions. The package includes the following: Base game KS Extras: Lithograph, Blitzkrieg Box, Terrain Pack, Spearhead, War Room, Red Baron, Reme Funck, and Clockwork Soldiers vs. Plague Troopers Battle of Brighton (plus extra troops as a kickstarter bonus) Heavy Metal Tilepack Omega Jetpacker Cpl. Cher Ami vs. Captain Elsa Frost M3 Vertical Tank vs. Landkrieger Pack Sturmrad vs. M7 Boss Pack Rivet Wars Hardcover Art Book Allied and Blight Turret Plugs Pack Here is a description of the contents included in the base pledge from the website: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/coolminiornot/rivet-wars Items included in Blitzkrieg: 1 Game ($100 value) The Vet and plug ($15 value) - Kickstarter/con exclusive R100 and plug ($15 value) - Kickstarter/con exclusive Babygirl and plug ($15 value) - Kickstarter/con exclusive Man in Charge and plug ($15 value) - Kickstarter/con exclusive 1 extra Ostrich tank ($20 value) 1 extra Sturmpanzer ($20 value) Faction patches ($5 value) Custom dice ($10 value) 24 extra infantry ($30 value) 4 Mountaineers and 4 Trench Raiders ($30) 8 extra cavalry ($20 value) Patston in Walker ($15 value) Romler in Scout Car ($15 value) 4 pairs Canine units ($20 value) 4 Extra Vehicles ($20 value) 1 Lithograph ($5 value) 150 page PDF Artbook ($5) Rosie and Rosie plug ($15) - Kickstarter/con exclusive Atomic Robo ($15) - Kickstarter/con exclusive Two turret emplacements and plugs ($10) Lt Brasseuldun ($15) Baron Munchen and plug ($15) Lt McCleod and plug ($15) Red Baron ($15) Reme Funck ($15) Uncle Rivet ($10) Kickstarter/con exclusive Iron Chancellor ($10) Kickstarter/con exclusive Terror Nova ($10) Kickstarter/con exclusive Cruel Minie ($10) Kickstarter/con exclusive Total value = $520 (so far) Additionally, several other items are included: Battle of Brighton (MSRP $80) (http://www.miniaturemarket.com/catalog/product/view/id/41855/s/cmnrw0008/) Plus an additional KS bonus of 2 scouts and an AA turret per faction Heavy Metal (MSRP $45) (http://www.miniaturemarket.com/catalog/product/view/id/41856/s/cmnrw0010/) Tilepack Omega inclues: Tile Set Expansion (MSRP $25) (http://www.miniaturemarket.com/catalog/product/view/id/41854/s/cmnrw0007/) Terrain Pack Expansion (MSRP $40) (http://www.miniaturemarket.com/catalog/product/view/id/41853/s/cmnrw0005/) Plus additional KS bonus of extra mission and action cards Jetpacker - Kickstarter Exclusive Cpl. Cher Ami vs. Captain Elsa Frost (Not listed for sale anywhere as of the start of this posting) M3 Vertical Tank vs. Landkrieger Pack (Not listed for sale anywhere as of the start of this posting) Includes 3 of each unit Sturmrad vs. M7 Boss Pack (Not listed for sale anywhere as of the start of this posting) Includes 3 of each unit Rivet Wars Hardcover Art Book (Not listed for sale anywhere as of the start of this posting) Allied and Blight Turret Plugs Pack (Not listed for sale anywhere as of the start of this posting) Includes 2x turret plug and 2x turret base for each faction
